content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(4.0, -63.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 4.0, -63.0) and a stone furnace (position 4.0, -63.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine (position unknown) and inserter (position unknown) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the furnace at position 4.0, -63.0 to assembling machine (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient materials
- Ensure that you have all necessary materials before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory and gather required resources beforehand.

### Errors when using crafting without sufficient ingredients
- Verify that you have the correct ingredients available for crafting before initiating the crafting process. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
